audioText: L'hiver passera vite si nous restons occupés avec nos projets.
question: What will happen to winter according to the speaker?
options: It will pass quickly if they stay busy with projects.
It will be very long and difficult.
It will bring many new opportunities.
It will be the coldest winter ever.
explanation: The text states 'L'hiver passera vite si nous restons occupés avec nos projets' - Winter will pass quickly if we stay busy with our projects. The future tense 'passera' (will pass) indicates a conditional prediction about time.
